getFrameInterval().name: getFrameInterval()

setFrameInterval(long).name: setFrameInterval(long)

setPostCallbackDelay(int).name: setPostCallbackDelay(int)
setPostCallbackDelay(int).documentation:
Allows application to specify a fixed amount of delay when {@link #postCallback(int, Runnable, Object)} is invoked. The default delay value is `0`. This can be used to avoid infinite animation tasks to be spawned when the Robolectric {@link org.robolectric.util.Scheduler} is in {@link org.robolectric.util.Scheduler.IdleState#PAUSED} mode.

Only supported in {@link LooperMode.Mode.LEGACY}

setPostFrameCallbackDelay(int).name: setPostFrameCallbackDelay(int)

name: org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowChoreographer
documentation:
The shadow API for {@link android.view.Choreographer}.

Different shadow implementations will be used depending on the current {@link LooperMode}. See {@link ShadowLegacyChoreographer} and {@link ShadowPausedChoreographer} for details.
